name: DriveTimeTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open Drive Time Trivia”
”Repeat the last question”
”My answer is two”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: drive time trivia
des:
Have a little fun while you practice your DMV driving test. With the variety of questions from across the United States, anyone can have fun while learning the rules of the road. 

Ask Alexa to start a new game. As you work your way through the questions, Alexa will keep track of your score and help prepare you for the big test. 

You can ask Alexa to start a new game, tell you the current score, and repeat the question. The interaction is easy to follow. When Alexa asks you the question and let's you choose from the 4 answers. To select your answer, reply with "one", "two", "three", or "four". After a round of 5 questions, she'll let you know how you did.

Take the challenge and see how many rounds you can survive.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
